quote.issuer_name: ContiOcean Environment Tech Group Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: ContiOcean Environment Tech Group Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: ContiOcean Environment Tech Group Co Ltd is a China-based company primarily engaged in the provision of maritime environmental protection equipment and system. The Company mainly operates four business segments. The Marine Exhaust Gas Cleaning Systems Business segment is engaged in sales of ship exhaust gas cleaning systems (including open-loop and hybrid types). The Marine Energy-Saving Devices Business segment is engaged in the sales of energy saving devices including rudder bulb, pre-shrouded vanes, hub vortex absorbed fins, wind deflector and others. The Marine Clean-energy Supply Systems Business segment is engaged in the sales of low-flashpoint fuel supply system and fuel gas supply system. The Maritime Services Business segment is engaged in ship accommodation interior design and construction, including provision of relevant equipment and other maritime services. The Company conducts its business in the domestic and overseas markets.
